quotes.quote: Hmm… I’m detecting a high degree of cerebral cortex activity. You’re not the muscle-bound automatons the press makes you out to be.
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: You have a better idea?
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: It means always… It means always… It means always strip you always strip our enemy of weapons before you interrogate him.
quotes.author: Spartan

quotes.quote: Relax! I’d Rather Not Piss This Thing Off!
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: Men, keep your eyes downrange, fingers on the triggers, and we all come home in one piece. Am I right, Marines?
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: That, or you can hide behind me. You done with my boy here Master Guns? I don’t see any training wheels.
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: Enough! The Flood is spreading. If we activate Halo's defenses, we can wipe them out.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: And you told me you were gonna wear something nice.
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: Our fighters are mopping up the last of their recon picket now, nothing serious; but I’ve isolated approach signatures from multiple CCS-class battle groups, make it three capital ships per group. And, in about 90 seconds, they’ll be all over us.
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: Folks need heroes chief, to give ’em hope, so smile would ya, while we still got something to smile about!
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: That's a one-way trip.
quotes.author: Noble Six

quotes.quote: No. I think we’re just getting started.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: For a brick… he flew pretty good.
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: You told me there wouldn’t be any cameras.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: Negative. I have the gun. Good luck, sir.
quotes.author: Noble Six

quotes.quote: Well, he’s in a particularly fine mood. Maybe Lord Hood didn’t give him an invitation.
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: A dozen Covenant superior battleships against a single Halcyon-class cruiser. Given those odds, I’m content with three … make that four kills.
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: Asking’s Not My Strong Suit.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: Since you’re ‘in the know,’ Master Chief, I assume you have a plan.
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: What the hell are you doing?
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: Thought I’d Try Shooting My Way Out—Mix Things Up A Little.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: Dear Humanity… We regret being alien bastards. We regret coming to Earth. And we most definitely regret that the Corps just blew up our raggedy-ass fleet!
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: If I still had fingers, they’d be crossed…
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: And the good news?
quotes.author: Noble Six

quotes.quote: She Said That To Me Once. About Being A Machine.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: Stand back, Marines. Let the Chief show you how it’s done!
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: With all due respect, sir, this war has enough dead heroes.
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: Watch your mouth, son. This “stuff” is your history. It should remind you grunts what we’re fightin’ to protect.
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: That Brute has the Index. And Miranda and Johnson. He can activate the ring.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: The Chief is gonna jump in this tank, roll across the bridge, and blow up any inhuman-son-of-bitch dumb enough to get between him and the Prophet of Regret! Pull yourself together, because you’re going with him!
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: Wake Me…When You Need Me.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: The Autumn will continue evasive maneuvers until you initiate a landing sequence. Not that you’ll listen, but I’d suggest letting my subroutines handle the final approach.
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: I’ll find Cortana’s solution. And I’ll bring it back.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: Usually the good Lord works in mysterious ways. But not today! This here is sixty-six tons of straight-up, H-E-spewing dee-vine intervention! If God is love, then you can call me Cupid!
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: I’m getting you out of here.
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: I Need A Weapon
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: What’s an aspect ratio?’ It’s the shape and proportion of your screen, fool!
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: We make our own luck, but I’ll always be there when you need me.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: Now would be a very good time to leave!
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: He didn’t make it.
quotes.author: Noble Six

quotes.quote: Trust me, I can stick it
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: Security to the bridge, the Master Chief has gone rampant! Take him down, boys.
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: Chief, wait! The Arbiter’s with us!
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: We’ll head for the Portal. And we’ll all go home.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: This cave is not a natural formation. Someone built it, so it must lead somewhere. I’ve hacked into the Covenant battlenet. They’re actually broadcasting tactical data on unencrypted channels. We should show them who they’re dealing with. Master Chief? I’m going to use your suit’s transponder system to monitor their chatter.
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: We need to get off this ship.
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: This isn’t as fun as it looks. Cut the power!
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: This ring isn’t a cudgel, you barbarian: it’s something else…something much more important. The Covenant were right…this ring…it’s Forerunner. Give me a second to access… Yes, the Forerunners built this place, what they called a ‘fortress world,’ in order to… No, that can’t be. Oh, those Covenant fools, they must have known; there must have been signs!
quotes.author: Cortana

quotes.quote: This ring isn’t a cudgel, you barbarian: it’s something else…something much more important. The Covenant were right…this ring…it’s Forerunner. Give me a second to access… Yes, the Forerunners built this place, what they called a ‘fortress world,’ in order to… No, that can’t be. Oh, those Covenant fools, they must have known; there must have been signs!
quotes.author: Avery Johnson

quotes.quote: Slayer
quotes.author: Multiplayer Announcer

quotes.quote: Were it so easy
quotes.author: The Arbiter

quotes.quote: Tartarus Stop
quotes.author: The Arbiter

quotes.quote: This is Spartan 117
quotes.author: Master Chief

quotes.quote: Double Kill
quotes.author: Multiplayer Announcer

quotes.quote: King of the Hill
quotes.author: Multiplayer Announcer

quotes.quote: Oddball
quotes.author: Multiplayer Announcer

quotes.quote: Game Over
quotes.author: Multiplayer Announcer

quotes.quote: Hey Woodsgump, monopolized!?
quotes.author: Dragon Trayner, Zane

quotes.quote: Forget about them, we got explosives to set
quotes.author: Mickey

quotes.quote: Get the hell out of my armory split baaaaaah
quotes.author: Quartermaster Guns

quotes.quote: You mind telling me what you're doing on that ship?
quotes.author: Lord Hood
